General.Name: Vow Green Metals AS
General.Description: Vow Green Metals AS builds, owns, and operates plants that produce biocarbon and CO2 neutral gas in Norway. Its products include bio-carbon, bio-oil, and bioenergy. The company serves metallurgical and petrochemical industries. Vow Green Metals AS was incorporated in 2021 and is headquartered in Lysaker, Norway.
